channel.title: Black Ops
channel.description: So who's going to the 12:00 release tonight?

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Got it for PC 2 days ago and I haven’t stopped playing since.

I’ve owned all of them since modern warfare 1, but never really played online, so I’m pretty awful, add me on steam guys silent_cj

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:142, topic:368063”]Good to see they’ve been patching the game quite a bit, probably more fixes in the first 10 days of release than the entire year we had MW2.

Though I’m still kinda pissed I can’t hear footsteps of the people behind me in my headset despite them not having Ninja on, fucking irritating.

My main setup right now:

Commando with dual mags
Strela-3
Semtex
Concussion
Claymore
Hardline
Sleight of Hand Pro
Hacker

Helicopter, Blackbird, Chopper Gunner are killstreaks. KDR so far is 1.9 and rising, which is quite surprising considering how awful I usually am at CoD.[/quote]You were probably never awful, MW2 just took no skill so you would get but raped by UMPs. Black Ops actually takes skill, so anyone who actually does have skill will be good at the game :3

Now all I need is something like the F2000 from MW2 and I’ll be set <.<

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Good to see they’ve been patching the game quite a bit, probably more fixes in the first 10 days of release than the entire year we had MW2.

Though I’m still kinda pissed I can’t hear footsteps of the people behind me in my headset despite them not having Ninja on, fucking irritating.

My main setup right now:

Commando with dual mags
Strela-3
Semtex
Concussion
Claymore
Hardline
Sleight of Hand Pro
Hacker

Helicopter, Blackbird, Chopper Gunner are killstreaks. KDR so far is 1.9 and rising, which is quite surprising considering how awful I usually am at CoD.

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:139, topic:368063”][quote author=Rich link=topic=464208.msg3400751#msg3400751 date=1289891658]

I actually don’t like CoD. I don’t even see how it is amazing.

They aren’t amazing, but they’re fun to play with bros.

I’ve pretty much stopped playing unless I have a party of a few friends who know what they’re doing, it gets too annoying losing game after game (not to mention dying because they don’t watch your back, etc) with incompetent teammates.
[/quote]Then kind of like badcomany, they put in you squads and no one listens but your friends. If that’s what you mean.[/quote]

I just stand there fighting with 50% of the squad over the helicopter.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:131, topic:368063”][quote author=Rich link=topic=464208.msg3399324#msg3399324 date=1289766386]

they got 15th legit? holy shit

No, they’re currently on 3rd prestige, but yes, it’s legit. They have their members taking 4 hour shifts and playing 24/7, while livestreaming it. They’re trying to be the first ones to get 15th prestige.

They had Josh Olin (Treyarch’s Community Manager) on the livestream the other night, he played a few games and stayed for quite a few hours answering questions in the chat.
[/quote]that guys a fucking moron. ill watch em tomorrow when they get unbanned :p[/quote]Josh Olin? He can be funny as shit as seen here:

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:128, topic:368063”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=464208.msg3399274#msg3399274 date=1289762666]
Which is better, the FAMAS or the Commando?
[/quote]
Personal preference really, I haven’t tried the Commando yet but the FAMAS is decent. I prefer the AK47 or the AUG over it though.

A bit OT, but Machinima’s FifteenPrestige account got banned for a day as they apparently got massively reported as people thought they were boosting/hacking. They are currently on 3rd prestige.[/quote]they got 15th legit? holy shit

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:124, topic:368063”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=464208.msg3398354#msg3398354 date=1289682608]

They need a few big maps. I want more big jungle maps
[/quote]Yea, they definitely need more sniper-efficient maps. Jungle and WMD aren’t enough for me.

I lol’d at people trying to snipe in Jungle.[/quote]Eh, I can usually do pretty good in there.

Although this doesn’t have anything to do with sniping, its funny as hell to get the final killcam and keep shooting after they’re dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:117, topic:368063”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=464208.msg3398236#msg3398236 date=1289673523]

Just got my first chopper gunner

  1. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xgj4e4OrnbM
  2. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG5upHGpnR8

Was trying out theater mode, it’s terrible. 30 second length limit is shit.
[/quote]lol i like how u shot the car package thing

lol, I’m surprised it didn’t go down, it took quite a few hits.

@Exion: Gratz, and thanks

PS if you have an Xbox add me: Goodlytom[/quote]
Added. I’m Evoze.
